
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

gapminder <- read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/resbaz/r-novice-gapminder-files/master/data/gapminder-FiveYearData.csv"
)

gapLife = gapminder %>% group_by(continent,year) %>% summarize(avglifeExp = mean(lifeExp))
view(gapLife)

ggplot(gapLife, aes(x = year, y = avglifeExp, color = continent))+
geom_line()
```
